TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridItem extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class DataGridItem Inherits TableRow Implements IDataItemContainer
public ref class DataGridItem : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableRow, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer
type DataGridItem = class inherit TableRow interface IDataItemContainer interface INamingContainer

summary.span: 代表 控制項中的項目 (資料列)。

span.span: Represents an item (row) in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件表示的項目 （資料列） 的控制，例如頁首區段中，[頁尾] 區段中或資料列。A object represents an item (row) in a control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data row. 資料項目控制會儲存在集合，可以使用來存取屬性控制項。The data items of a control are stored in a collection that can be accessed by using the property of the control. 您可以使用物件來以程式設計方式存取的屬性中的項目控制項。You can use a object to programmatically access the properties of an item in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件來顯示內容中的每個資料項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display the contents of each data item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). summary.span: 取得或設定資料項目，其由 控制項中的 物件所表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the data item represented by the object in the control.

value.span: ，表示 控制項中的資料項目。

span.span: A that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷項目所代表之資料的屬性物件中控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the properties of a data item represented by the object in the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property applies only to data items in the control. 屬性必須設為`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示資料中的項目內容控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the contents of the data items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得索引繫結的資料來源的物件。Use the property to get the index of the object from the bound data source. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property applies only to data items in the control. 的屬性物件必須設為`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用若要顯示的索引屬性繫結的資料來源的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index of the object from the bound data source. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. span.span: Gets the index of the object from the collection of the control.

value.span: 控制項之 集合中 的索引。

span.span: The index of the from the collection of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷索引物件的集合控制項。Use the property to determine the index of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property applies only to data items in the control. 的屬性物件必須設為`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示的索引物件的集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). summary.span: 取得項目的類型，這項目為 控制項中的 物件所表示。

span.span: Gets the type of the item represented by the object in the control.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷型別中的項目控制項。Use the property to determine the type of an item in the control. 下表列出各種不同的項目類型。The following table lists the various item types. |項目類型Item Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|標題區段的控制項。The heading section of the control.| |`Footer`|頁尾區段的控制項。The footer section of the control.| |`Item`|中的項目控制項。An item in the control.| |`AlternatingItem`|中的交替項目控制項。An alternating item in the control.| |`SelectedItem`|在 選取的項目控制項。The selected item in the control.| |`EditItem`|在 編輯選取的項目控制項。The item selected for editing in the control.| |`Separator`|項目之間的分隔符號控制項。A separator between the items of the control.| |`Pager`|頁面選取項目區段的控制項。The page selection section of the control.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷型別中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of an item in the control. 在建立項目順序控制項都會顯示此項目類型。The order in which items are created in the control is displayed along with the item type. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)]
